titleStmt.title: An answer to a paper entituled The case of the Protestant dissenters of Ireland in reference to a bill of indulgence, represented and argued.
titleStmt.author: Pullen, Tobias, 1648-1713.
Boyse, J. (Joseph), 1660-1728, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Joseph Ray at the 3 Nags-Heads in Essex-street,

notesStmt.note: By Tobias Pullen; sometimes also attributed to Joseph Boyse (cf. Halkett & Laing).
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
